RelatedSentence: Three people were injured when an armed gang attacked them at Demanhandiya in Negombo and two persons of the gang were injured from police fire during a confrontation later , police said .
Three people were injured when an armed gang attacked them at Demanhandiya in Negombo and two persons of the gang were injured from police fire during a confrontation later , police said .
They said the gang had attacked two women and a man with swords in a house in Demanhandiya last night on a personal dispute .

Police had rushed to the location and the gang had started attacking police officers .
